as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="of2V5p2K3FzHEzP7bxc1-5" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" parent="1" source="of2V5p2K3FzHEzP7bxc1-3" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="440" y="1120" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="of2V5p2K3FzHEzP7bxc1-3" value="Text" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="415" y="1068" width="50" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="of2V5p2K3FzHEzP7bxc1-6" value="Design Patterns" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="426" y="4335" width="160" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="of2V5p2K3FzHEzP7bxc1-7" value="Singleton pattern" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="176" y="4415" width="110" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="of2V5p2K3FzHEzP7bxc1-8" value="- ensures one instance per class" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="186" y="4445" width="200" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="of2V5p2K3FzHEzP7bxc1-9" value="- ioc ensures one bean in the context for a class" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="186" y="4465" width="280" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="of2V5p2K3FzHEzP7bxc1-10" value="Factory pattern" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="176" y="4545" width="100" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="of2V5p2K3FzHEzP7bxc1-11" value="- creates the object without exposing the instantiation logic to the client" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="186" y="4575" width="400" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="of2V5p2K3FzHEzP7bxc1-12" value="- @Bean in rest template" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="186" y="4595" width="160" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="of2V5p2K3FzHEzP7bxc1-13" value="- by default spring beans are singleton" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="186" y="4485" width="230" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="of2V5p2K3FzHEzP7bxc1-14" value="Prototype Pattern" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="176" y="4635" width="120" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-1" value="<b>1. Application start up and Application context initialization</b>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="62.5" y="104" width="355" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-3" value="- starting point : main() -&gt; run()" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="99.5" y="133" width="181" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-4" value="- application context will be created" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="96" y="159" width="205" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-5" value="- @Spring boot application = @ComponentScan + @EnableAutoConfiguratio + @Configuration" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="95" y="187" width="525" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-6" value="- @ComponentScan - scans all the component (@component, @controller, @Service etc) creates the bean and stores in<br>&nbsp;application-context" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="95" y="218" width="660" height="41" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-7" value="- @EnableAutoConfiguratio&nbsp;- look for stater dependecies - and configure things automaticcaly&nbsp;<br>if jpa stater found - configues hibernate, data source auto<br>if web stater dependency found - configure embeded server automaticaaly<br>if actuator dependecy found : exposes halth, metrices api for monitoring" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="94" y="259" width="518" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-8" value="- @Configuartion : look for the classes where we have defined @Bean and register" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="94" y="343" width="459" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-9" value="- loads properties file (profile)" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="98" y="378" width="173" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-10" value="<b>2. Embeded server</b>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="86" y="410" width="125" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-11" value="- auto configure dispacter server (routing)" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="98" y="436" width="238" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-12" value="- handler-mapping -&gt; pick up the correct controller" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="97" y="462" width="284" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-14" value="- selialization" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="105" y="488" width="87" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-15" value="<b>3. Dependency injection</b>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="85" y="511" width="155" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-16" value="- spring beans are created, managed, destroyed by ioc contaner, (inversion of controller)&nbsp;" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="101" y="540" width="490" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-17" value="- 3 ways (constructer injection, field injection(autowire), setter injection)" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="101" y="566" width="394" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-18" value="- making ensures beans are ready to be used whenever there is a dependancy" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="592" width="436" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-19" value="<b>4. Apllication stop</b>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="84" y="616" width="121" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-20" value="- application context will be destroyed" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="94" y="642" width="217" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-21" value="- @PreDestroy will be called : disconnect db conn" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="94" y="665" width="282" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-23" value="<b>Spring boot internal working</b>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="336" y="42" width="202" height="33" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-25" value="Text" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="398" y="2181" width="40" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-26" value="Text" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="419" y="3290" width="40" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-27" value="<b>Annotations</b>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="339" y="1110" width="120" height="33" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-28" value="<h3 data-start="145" data-end="197"><strong data-start="149" data-end="195">1-10: Core &amp; Application-Level Annotations</strong></h3><ol data-start="198" data-end="1070"><li data-start="198" data-end="339"><strong data-start="201" data-end="229"><code data-start="203" data-end="227">@SpringBootApplication</code></strong> – Combines <code data-start="241" data-end="257">@Configuration</code>, <code data-start="259" data-end="285">@EnableAutoConfiguration</code>, and <code data-start="291" data-end="307">@ComponentScan</code> to bootstrap the application.</li><li data-start="340" data-end="414"><strong data-start="343" data-end="363"><code data-start="345" data-end="361">@Configuration</code></strong> – Marks a class as a source of bean definitions.</li><li data-start="415" data-end="512"><strong data-start="418" data-end="438"><code data-start="420" data-end="436">@ComponentScan</code></strong> – Automatically detects and registers beans from the specified package.</li><li data-start="513" data-end="592"><strong data-start="516" data-end="546"><code data-start="518" data-end="544">@EnableAutoConfiguration</code></strong> – Enables Spring Boot’s auto-configuration.</li><li data-start="593" data-end="671"><strong data-start="596" data-end="607"><code data-start="598" data-end="605">@Bean</code></strong> – Declares a Spring-managed bean in a <code data-start="646" data-end="662">@Configuration</code> class.</li><li data-start="672" data-end="756"><strong data-start="675" data-end="691"><code data-start="677" data-end="689">@Component</code></strong> – Generic annotation for registering a class as a Spring Bean.</li><li data-start="757" data-end="836"><strong data-start="760" data-end="774"><code data-start="762" data-end="772">@Service</code></strong> – Specialized <code data-start="789" data-end="801">@Component</code> indicating a service-layer bean.</li><li data-start="837" data-end="917"><strong data-start="840" data-end="857"><code data-start="842" data-end="855">@Repository</code></strong> – Specialized <code data-start="872" data-end="884">@Component</code> for data access objects (DAO).</li><li data-start="918" data-end="982"><strong data-start="921" data-end="938"><code data-start="923" data-end="936">@Controller</code></strong> – Defines a web controller in Spring MVC.</li><li data-start="983" data-end="1070"><strong data-start="987" data-end="1008"><code data-start="989" data-end="1006">@RestController</code></strong> – Combines <code data-start="1020" data-end="1033">@Controller</code> and <code data-start="1038" data-end="1053">@ResponseBody</code> for REST APIs.</li></ol>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="49" y="1166" width="651" height="262" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-30" value="<h3 data-start="1077" data-end="1142"><strong data-start="1081" data-end="1140">11-20: Dependency Injection &amp; Configuration Annotations</strong></h3><ol start="11" data-start="1143" data-end="1845"><li data-start="1143" data-end="1203"><strong data-start="1147" data-end="1163"><code data-start="1149" data-end="1161">@Autowired</code></strong> – Injects dependencies automatically.</li><li data-start="1204" data-end="1268"><strong data-start="1208" data-end="1224"><code data-start="1210" data-end="1222">@Qualifier</code></strong> – Helps resolve multiple bean candidates.</li><li data-start="1269" data-end="1345"><strong data-start="1273" data-end="1287"><code data-start="1275" data-end="1285">@Primary</code></strong> – Specifies the default bean when multiple beans exist.</li><li data-start="1346" data-end="1415"><strong data-start="1350" data-end="1362"><code data-start="1352" data-end="1360">@Value</code></strong> – Injects values from properties files into beans.</li><li data-start="1416" data-end="1505"><strong data-start="1420" data-end="1432"><code data-start="1422" data-end="1430">@Scope</code></strong> – Defines the scope of a Spring bean (<code data-start="1471" data-end="1482">singleton</code>, <code data-start="1484" data-end="1495">prototype</code>, etc.).</li><li data-start="1506" data-end="1572"><strong data-start="1510" data-end="1521"><code data-start="1512" data-end="1519">@Lazy</code></strong> – Delays bean initialization until it is needed.</li><li data-start="1573" data-end="1636"><strong data-start="1577" data-end="1597"><code data-start="1579" data-end="1595">@PostConstruct</code></strong> – Executes code after bean creation.</li><li data-start="1637" data-end="1701"><strong data-start="1641" data-end="1658"><code data-start="1643" data-end="1656">@PreDestroy</code></strong> – Executes code before bean destruction.</li><li data-start="1702" data-end="1772"><strong data-start="1706" data-end="1722"><code data-start="1708" data-end="1720">@DependsOn</code></strong> – Ensures a bean is initialized before another.</li><li data-start="1773" data-end="1845"><strong data-start="1777" data-end="1791"><code data-start="1779" data-end="1789">@Profile</code></strong> – Activates beans based on the environment profile.</li></ol>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="63.50333333333347" y="1401" width="475" height="223" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-31" value="<h3 data-start="1852" data-end="1903"><strong data-start="1856" data-end="1901">21-30: Web &amp; Request Handling Annotations</strong></h3><ol start="21" data-start="1904" data-end="2712"><li data-start="1904" data-end="1975"><strong data-start="1908" data-end="1929"><code data-start="1910" data-end="1927">@RequestMapping</code></strong> – Maps HTTP requests to controller methods.</li><li data-start="1976" data-end="2061"><strong data-start="1980" data-end="1997"><code data-start="1982" data-end="1995">@GetMapping</code></strong> – Shortcut for <code data-start="2013" data-end="2058">@RequestMapping(method = RequestMethod.GET)</code>.</li><li data-start="2062" data-end="2149"><strong data-start="2066" data-end="2084"><code data-start="2068" data-end="2082">@PostMapping</code></strong> – Shortcut for <code data-start="2100" data-end="2146">@RequestMapping(method = RequestMethod.POST)</code>.</li><li data-start="2150" data-end="2235"><strong data-start="2154" data-end="2171"><code data-start="2156" data-end="2169">@PutMapping</code></strong> – Shortcut for <code data-start="2187" data-end="2232">@RequestMapping(method = RequestMethod.PUT)</code>.</li><li data-start="2236" data-end="2327"><strong data-start="2240" data-end="2260"><code data-start="2242" data-end="2258">@DeleteMapping</code></strong> – Shortcut for <code data-start="2276" data-end="2324">@RequestMapping(method = RequestMethod.DELETE)</code>.</li><li data-start="2328" data-end="2417"><strong data-start="2332" data-end="2351"><code data-start="2334" data-end="2349">@PatchMapping</code></strong> – Shortcut for <code data-start="2367" data-end="2414">@RequestMapping(method = RequestMethod.PATCH)</code>.</li><li data-start="2418" data-end="2511"><strong data-start="2422" data-end="2441"><code data-start="2424" data-end="2439">@ResponseBody</code></strong> – Indicates that a method return value should be the response body.</li><li data-start="2512" data-end="2575"><strong data-start="2516" data-end="2535"><code data-start="2518" data-end="2533">@PathVariable</code></strong> – Extracts path parameters from URLs.</li><li data-start="2576" data-end="2640"><strong data-start="2580" data-end="2599"><code data-start="2582" data-end="2597">@RequestParam</code></strong> – Extracts query parameters from URLs.</li><li data-start="2641" data-end="2712"><strong data-start="2645" data-end="2663"><code data-start="2647" data-end="2661">@RequestBody</code></strong> – Maps the request body to a method parameter</li></ol>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="77.99666666666675" y="1624.0033333333336" width="550" height="223" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-32" value="<h3 data-start="2719" data-end="2781"><strong data-start="2723" data-end="2779">31-40: Database &amp; Transaction Management Annotations</strong></h3><ol start="31" data-start="2782" data-end="3484"><li data-start="2782" data-end="2834"><strong data-start="2786" data-end="2799"><code data-start="2788" data-end="2797">@Entity</code></strong> – Marks a class as a JPA entity.</li><li data-start="2835" data-end="2894"><strong data-start="2839" data-end="2851"><code data-start="2841" data-end="2849">@Table</code></strong> – Specifies table details for an entity.</li><li data-start="2895" data-end="2952"><strong data-start="2899" data-end="2908"><code data-start="2901" data-end="2906">@Id</code></strong> – Declares the primary key for an entity.</li><li data-start="2953" data-end="3029"><strong data-start="2957" data-end="2978"><code data-start="2959" data-end="2976">@GeneratedValue</code></strong> – Specifies the primary key generation strategy.</li><li data-start="3030" data-end="3100"><strong data-start="3034" data-end="3047"><code data-start="3036" data-end="3045">@Column</code></strong> – Defines properties for entity fields in a table.</li><li data-start="3101" data-end="3166"><strong data-start="3105" data-end="3120"><code data-start="3107" data-end="3118">@OneToOne</code></strong> – Defines a one-to-one relationship in JPA.</li><li data-start="3167" data-end="3234"><strong data-start="3171" data-end="3187"><code data-start="3173" data-end="3185">@OneToMany</code></strong> – Defines a one-to-many relationship in JPA.</li><li data-start="3235" data-end="3302"><strong data-start="3239" data-end="3255"><code data-start="3241" data-end="3253">@ManyToOne</code></strong> – Defines a many-to-one relationship in JPA.</li><li data-start="3303" data-end="3382"><strong data-start="3307" data-end="3327"><code data-start="3309" data-end="3325">@Transactional</code></strong> – Manages transactions at the method or class level.</li><li data-start="3383" data-end="3484"><strong data-start="3387" data-end="3421"><code data-start="3389" data-end="3419">@EnableTransactionManagement</code></strong> – Enables Spring’s annotation-driven transaction management.</li></ol>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="78" y="1836" width="550" height="237" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-33" value="<h3 data-start="3491" data-end="3538"><strong data-start="3495" data-end="3536">41-50: Advanced &amp; Utility Annotations</strong></h3><ol start="41" data-start="3539" data-end="4265"><li data-start="3539" data-end="3621"><strong data-start="3543" data-end="3566"><code data-start="3545" data-end="3564">@ExceptionHandler</code></strong> – Defines custom exception handling for controllers.</li><li data-start="3622" data-end="3708"><strong data-start="3626" data-end="3649"><code data-start="3628" data-end="3647">@ControllerAdvice</code></strong> – Global exception handling across multiple controllers.</li><li data-start="3709" data-end="3791"><strong data-start="3713" data-end="3740"><code data-start="3715" data-end="3738">@RestControllerAdvice</code></strong> – Specialized <code data-start="3755" data-end="3774">@ControllerAdvice</code> for REST APIs.</li><li data-start="3792" data-end="3864"><strong data-start="3796" data-end="3814"><code data-start="3798" data-end="3812">@CrossOrigin</code></strong> – Enables Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS).</li><li data-start="3865" data-end="3932"><strong data-start="3869" data-end="3885"><code data-start="3871" data-end="3883">@Scheduled</code></strong> – Schedules a method to run at a fixed rate.</li><li data-start="3933" data-end="4007"><strong data-start="3937" data-end="3960"><code data-start="3939" data-end="3958">@EnableScheduling</code></strong> – Enables scheduling support in Spring Boot.</li><li data-start="4008" data-end="4071"><strong data-start="4012" data-end="4024"><code data-start="4014" data-end="4022">@Async</code></strong> – Enables asynchronous execution of methods.</li><li data-start="4072" data-end="4139"><strong data-start="4076" data-end="4094"><code data-start="4078" data-end="4092">@EnableAsync</code></strong> – Enables asynchronous processing support.</li><li data-start="4140" data-end="4204"><strong data-start="4144" data-end="4164"><code data-start="4146" data-end="4162">@EnableCaching</code></strong> – Enables Spring’s caching mechanism.</li><li data-start="4205" data-end="4265"><strong data-start="4209" data-end="4225"><code data-start="4211" data-end="4223">@Cacheable</code></strong> – Caches the result of a method call.</li></ol>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="94.00333333333347" y="2060" width="481" height="223" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-34" value="<h2 data-start="995" data-end="1036"><strong data-start="998" data-end="1034">61-70: Security &amp; Authentication</strong></h2><ol start="61" data-start="1037" data-end="1818"><li data-start="1037" data-end="1115"><strong data-start="1041" data-end="1065"><code data-start="1043" data-end="1063">@EnableWebSecurity</code></strong> – Enables Spring Security for web applications.</li><li data-start="1116" data-end="1208"><strong data-start="1120" data-end="1153"><code data-start="1122" data-end="1151">@EnableGlobalMethodSecurity</code></strong> – Enables security annotations like <code data-start="1190" data-end="1205">@PreAuthorize</code>.</li><li data-start="1209" data-end="1298"><strong data-start="1213" data-end="1232"><code data-start="1215" data-end="1230">@PreAuthorize</code></strong> – Specifies authorization conditions before executing a method.</li><li data-start="1299" data-end="1374"><strong data-start="1303" data-end="1323"><code data-start="1305" data-end="1321">@PostAuthorize</code></strong> – Checks authorization after executing a method.</li><li data-start="1375" data-end="1436"><strong data-start="1379" data-end="1398"><code data-start="1381" data-end="1396">@RolesAllowed</code></strong> – Defines roles allowed for access.</li><li data-start="1437" data-end="1502"><strong data-start="1441" data-end="1455"><code data-start="1443" data-end="1453">@Secured</code></strong> – Restricts method access to specific roles.</li><li data-start="1503" data-end="1597"><strong data-start="1507" data-end="1537"><code data-start="1509" data-end="1535">@AuthenticationPrincipal</code></strong> – Injects the currently authenticated user into a method.</li><li data-start="1598" data-end="1670"><strong data-start="1602" data-end="1624"><code data-start="1604" data-end="1622">@EnableOAuth2Sso</code></strong> – Enables Single Sign-On (SSO) with OAuth2.</li><li data-start="1671" data-end="1747"><strong data-start="1675" data-end="1700"><code data-start="1677" data-end="1698">@EnableOAuth2Client</code></strong> – Enables OAuth2 authentication for clients.</li><li data-start="1748" data-end="1818"><strong data-start="1752" data-end="1776"><code data-start="1754" data-end="1774">@SessionAttributes</code></strong> – Stores model attributes in a session.</li></ol>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="78.00333333333347" y="2272.996666666667" width="527" height="229" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-35" value="<h2 data-start="2685" data-end="2729"><strong data-start="2688" data-end="2727">81-90: Spring Cloud &amp; Microservices</strong></h2><ol start="81" data-start="2730" data-end="3476"><li data-start="2730" data-end="2803"><strong data-start="2734" data-end="2759"><code data-start="2736" data-end="2757">@EnableEurekaClient</code></strong> – Registers a service as a Eureka client.</li><li data-start="2804" data-end="2891"><strong data-start="2808" data-end="2833"><code data-start="2810" data-end="2831">@EnableEurekaServer</code></strong> – Turns the application into a Eureka service registry.</li><li data-start="2892" data-end="2975"><strong data-start="2896" data-end="2915"><code data-start="2898" data-end="2913">@LoadBalanced</code></strong> – Enables client-side load balancing with <code data-start="2958" data-end="2972">RestTemplate</code>.</li><li data-start="2976" data-end="3046"><strong data-start="2980" data-end="3007"><code data-start="2982" data-end="3005">@EnableCircuitBreaker</code></strong> – Enables Circuit Breaker (Hystrix).</li><li data-start="3047" data-end="3124"><strong data-start="3051" data-end="3072"><code data-start="3053" data-end="3070">@HystrixCommand</code></strong> – Defines a fallback method for failure handling.</li><li data-start="3125" data-end="3187"><strong data-start="3129" data-end="3147"><code data-start="3131" data-end="3145">@FeignClient</code></strong> – Declares a REST client using Feign.</li><li data-start="3188" data-end="3263"><strong data-start="3192" data-end="3217"><code data-start="3194" data-end="3215">@EnableFeignClients</code></strong> – Enables Feign clients in the application.</li><li data-start="3264" data-end="3326"><strong data-start="3268" data-end="3290"><code data-start="3270" data-end="3288">@EnableZuulProxy</code></strong> – Enables Zuul API Gateway proxy.</li><li data-start="3327" data-end="3396"><strong data-start="3331" data-end="3356"><code data-start="3333" data-end="3354">@EnableConfigServer</code></strong> – Enables Spring Cloud Config Server.</li><li data-start="3397" data-end="3476"><strong data-start="3401" data-end="3420"><code data-start="3403" data-end="3418">@RefreshScope</code></strong> – Reloads beans when configuration properties change.</li></ol>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="68" y="2524.996666666667" width="478" height="229" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <UserObject label="<h2 data-start="3483" data-end="3519"><strong data-start="3486" data-end="3517">91-100: Testing &amp; Debugging</strong></h2><ol start="91" data-start="3520" data-end="4198"><li data-start="3520" data-end="3597"><strong data-start="3524" data-end="3545"><code data-start="3526" data-end="3543">@SpringBootTest</code></strong> – Loads the full application context for testing.</li><li data-start="3598" data-end="3668"><strong data-start="3602" data-end="3619"><code data-start="3604" data-end="3617">@WebMvcTest</code></strong> – Loads only web layer components for testing.</li><li data-start="3669" data-end="3734"><strong data-start="3673" data-end="3691"><code data-start="3675" data-end="3689">@DataJpaTest</code></strong> – Loads only JPA components for testing.</li><li data-start="3735" data-end="3786"><strong data-start="3739" data-end="3754"><code data-start="3741" data-end="3752">@MockBean</code></strong> – Creates a mock Spring bean.</li><li data-start="3787" data-end="3843"><strong data-start="3791" data-end="3805"><code data-start="3793" data-end="3803">@SpyBean</code></strong> – Spies on an existing Spring bean.</li><li data-start="3844" data-end="3921"><strong data-start="3848" data-end="3873"><code data-start="3850" data-end="3871">@TestPropertySource</code></strong> – Loads properties from a test-specific file.</li><li data-start="3922" data-end="3977"><strong data-start="3926" data-end="3943"><code data-start="3928" data-end="3941">@BeforeEach</code></strong> – Runs before each test method.</li><li data-start="3978" data-end="4031"><strong data-start="3982" data-end="3998"><code data-start="3984" data-end="3996">@AfterEach</code></strong> – Runs after each test method.</li><li data-start="4032" data-end="4111"><strong data-start="4036" data-end="4070"><code data-start="4038" data-end="4068">@RunWith(SpringRunner.class)</code></strong> – Integrates JUnit 4 with Spring Boot.</li><li data-start="4112" data-end="4198"><strong data-start="4117" data-end="4157"><code data-start="4119" data-end="4155">@ExtendWith(SpringExtension.class)</code></strong> – Integrates JUnit 5 with Spring Boot.</li></ol>" link="<h2 data-start="3483" data-end="3519"><strong data-start="3486" data-end="3517">91-100: Testing &amp; Debugging</strong></h2><ol start="91" data-start="3520" data-end="4198"><li data-start="3520" data-end="3597"><strong data-start="3524" data-end="3545"><code data-start="3526" data-end="3543">@SpringBootTest</code></strong> – Loads the full application context for testing.</li><li data-start="3598" data-end="3668"><strong data-start="3602" data-end="3619"><code data-start="3604" data-end="3617">@WebMvcTest</code></strong> – Loads only web layer components for testing.</li><li data-start="3669" data-end="3734"><strong data-start="3673" data-end="3691"><code data-start="3675" data-end="3689">@DataJpaTest</code></strong> – Loads only JPA components for testing.</li><li data-start="3735" data-end="3786"><strong data-start="3739" data-end="3754"><code data-start="3741" data-end="3752">@MockBean</code></strong> – Creates a mock Spring bean.</li><li data-start="3787" data-end="3843"><strong data-start="3791" data-end="3805"><code data-start="3793" data-end="3803">@SpyBean</code></strong> – Spies on an existing Spring bean.</li><li data-start="3844" data-end="3921"><strong data-start="3848" data-end="3873"><code data-start="3850" data-end="3871">@TestPropertySource</code></strong> – Loads properties from a test-specific file.</li><li data-start="3922" data-end="3977"><strong data-start="3926" data-end="3943"><code data-start="3928" data-end="3941">@BeforeEach</code></strong> – Runs before each test method.</li><li data-start="3978" data-end="4031"><strong data-start="3982" data-end="3998"><code data-start="3984" data-end="3996">@AfterEach</code></strong> – Runs after each test method.</li><li data-start="4032" data-end="4111"><strong data-start="4036" data-end="4070"><code data-start="4038" data-end="4068">@RunWith(SpringRunner.class)</code></strong> – Integrates JUnit 4 with Spring Boot.</li><li data-start="4112" data-end="4198"><strong data-start="4117" data-end="4157"><code data-start="4119" data-end="4155">@ExtendWith(SpringExtension.class)</code></strong> – Integrates JUnit 5 with Spring Boot.</li></ol>" id="H7nJmKu4aD1r62CN7EpT-36"> <mxCell style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="63.5" y="2753.996666666667" width="494" height="229" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 230px; margin-left: 275px;

shapeObj.area()

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 364px; margin-left: 207px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

span.style: color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237)); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: center; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: nowrap; background-color: light-dark(rgb(251, 251, 251), rgb(21, 21, 21)); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;

div.style: forced-color-adjust: none; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237)); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: center; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: nowrap; background-color: light-dark(rgb(251, 251, 251), rgb(21, 21, 21)); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
